titles.title: Rural Multifamily Rental Housing Loan Guarantee Demonstration Act

To amend the Housing Act of 1949 to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to guarantee the repayment of loans made by private lenders for the development costs of multifamily rural rental housing for low- and moderate-income families in rural areas.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking and Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Community Opportunity.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Rural Multifamily Rental Housing Loan Guarantee Demonstration Act - Amends the Housing Act of 1949 to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to guarantee eligible loans for the development costs of low or moderate income rural multifamily rental housing. Authorizes appropriations.
